title: Monthly Stats, Frontend Summary, and Integration Hardening
description: Implement monthly stats endpoint, build frontend summary panel, and complete integration-level testing and operational polish.
acceptance_criteria: GET /api/stats/monthly?month=YYYY-MM returns month total, category breakdown, and expense count.
Frontend displays monthly summary totals and category breakdown using backend stats data.
CORS allows frontend dev origin and request logging includes method/path/status/duration.
Core backend handlers and storage logic have automated test coverage.
End-to-end manual check confirms data persists across backend restarts.
